import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../App.css'; function WebtoonDetail() { const { id } = useParams(); // Extract the webtoon ID from the URL const [webtoon, setWebtoon] = useState(null); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { // Fetch webtoon details from the backend using the ID fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/webtoons/${id}`) .then((response) => { if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch webtoon details'); } return response.json(); }) .then((data) => setWebtoon(data)) .catch((err) => setError(err.message)); }, [id]); if (error) { return
Error: {error}
; } if (!webtoon) { return
Loading...
; } return (
Home Categories Romance

{webtoon.episode}
